text: Robert Burren Morgan (October 5, 1925 - July 16, 2016) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was the United States Senator from the state of North Carolina. He served as senator for a single term from 1975 until 1981. Morgan died of heart failure on July 16, 2016 at his home in Buies Creek, North Carolina, aged 90.http://www.fayobserver.com/news/local/former-u-s-senator-robert-b-morgan- dies-at-home/article_b514f5b4-1931-5e70-8527-f24350e5144d.html ==References== ==Other websites== * Civil Rights Greensboro: Robert Morgan * Robert Morgan Papers (#268), East Carolina Manuscript Collection, J.
